p: There are seven CoV species recognized to infect human beings [ 12]. Among these, only MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV have been able to cause severe human disease. The rest are associated with mild respiratory ailments such as the common cold. However, they may cause serious consequences in immunocompromised individuals. At present, the medical severity of the nCoV-2019 (nCoV-19) is precisely unknown but life-threatening, and deaths have been associated with the infections [ 24].
